languages.text: "Честный суд? Нелепо! Здесь все прогнили до основания — еретики и безумцы! Будьте вы прокляты! Прокляты!"

traits.locale_text: "Честный суд? Нелепо! Здесь все прогнили до основания — еретики и безумцы! Будьте вы прокляты! Прокляты!"

languages.text: "You call this a fair trial? Ridiculous! Everyone here is rotten to the core. All of you are heretics and madmen! Curse you! Curse you!"
languages.original_text: "Честный суд? Нелепо! Здесь все прогнили до основания — еретики и безумцы! Будьте вы прокляты! Прокляты!"

traits.locale_text: "A fair trial? Ridiculous! Everyone here is rotten to the core. All of you are heretics are and madmen! Curse you! Curse you!"
"A fair trial? Ridiculous! Everyone here is rotten to the core. All of you are heretics are and madmen! Curse you! Curse you!"
"You call this a fair trial? Ridiculous! Everyone here is rotten to the core. All of you are heretics and madmen! Curse you! Curse you!"
"You call this a fair trial? Ridiculous! Everyone here is rotten to the core. All of you are heretics and madmen! Curse you! Curse you!"
"You call this a fair trial? Ridiculous! Everyone here is rotten to the core. All of you are heretics and madmen! Curse you! Curse you!"

languages.text: “你说这是公平公正的审判？简直是一派胡言！你们所有人都烂到了骨子里！你们所有人都是异端分子，都是疯子！我诅咒你们！诅咒你们！”
languages.original_text: "You call this a fair trial? Ridiculous! Everyone here is rotten to the core. All of you are heretics and madmen! Curse you! Curse you!"

traits.locale_text: “你说这是公平公正的审判？简直是一派胡言！你们所有人都烂到了骨子里！你们所有人都是异端分子，都是疯子！我诅咒你们！诅咒你们！”

languages.text: «¿Llama a esto un juicio justo? ¡Es ridículo! Todos los presentes están podridos hasta la médula. ¡Son todos unos herejes y unos locos! ¡Malditos sean!».
languages.original_text: "You call this a fair trial? Ridiculous! Everyone here is rotten to the core. All of you are heretics and madmen! Curse you! Curse you!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Llama a esto un juicio justo? ¡Es ridículo! Todos los presentes están podridos hasta la médula. ¡Son todos unos herejes y unos locos! ¡Malditos sean!».

languages.text: 「これが公正な審判だと言うの？バカバカしい！ここにいる全員が芯から腐っているわ。全員、異端者であり狂人だ！呪ってやる！呪ってやる！」
languages.original_text: "You call this a fair trial? Ridiculous! Everyone here is rotten to the core. All of you are heretics and madmen! Curse you! Curse you!"

traits.locale_text: 「これが公正な審判だと言うの？バカバカしい！ここにいる全員が芯から腐っているわ。全員、異端者であり狂人だ！呪ってやる！呪ってやる！」

languages.text: "Nennt Ihr das einen fairen Prozess? Lächerlich! Alle hier sind verkommen bis ins Mark. Alle hier sind Ketzer und Wahnsinnige! Verflucht sollt Ihr sein! Verflucht!"
languages.original_text: "You call this a fair trial? Ridiculous! Everyone here is rotten to the core. All of you are heretics and madmen! Curse you! Curse you!"

traits.locale_text: "Nennt Ihr das einen fairen Prozess? Lächerlich! Alle hier sind verkommen bis ins Mark. Alle hier sind Ketzer und Wahnsinnige! Verflucht sollt Ihr sein! Verflucht!!

languages.text: « Et vous appelez ça rendre justice ? Foutaises ! Vous tous ici êtes pourris jusqu'à la moelle. Vous n'êtes que des hérétiques doublés d'imbéciles ! Soyez maudits ! Tous autant que vous êtes ! »
languages.original_text: "You call this a fair trial? Ridiculous! Everyone here is rotten to the core. All of you are heretics and madmen! Curse you! Curse you!"

traits.locale_text: « Et vous appelez ça rendre justice ? Foutaises ! Vous tous ici êtes pourris jusqu'à la moelle. Vous n'êtes que des hérétiques doublés d'imbéciles ! Soyez maudits ! Tous autant que vous êtes ! »

languages.text: "Siz buna adil yargılama mı diyorsunuz? Saçmalık. Buradaki herkesin içi çürümüş. Hepiniz kâfirsiniz, delirmişsiniz! Hepinize lanet olsun! Hepinize!"
languages.original_text: "You call this a fair trial? Ridiculous! Everyone here is rotten to the core. All of you are heretics and madmen! Curse you! Curse you!"

traits.locale_text: "Siz buna adil yargılama mı diyorsunuz? Saçmalık. Buradaki herkesin içi çürümüş. Hepiniz kâfirsiniz ve delirmişsiniz! Hepinize lanet olsun! Hepinize!"
